H0.text: Learning how to speak the same language is what scientists from around the world would most likely do at a conference held in Paris, France.

H1.text: Work together on scientific research is what scientists from around the world would most likely do at a conference held in Paris, France.

H2.text: Teaching students the importance of education is why scientists from around the world would most likely meet at a conference held in Paris, France.

H3.text: Scientists from around the world would most likely meet at a conference held in Paris, France, to show other scientists the scientific method.

A4.text: the possibility to engage in informal communication with peers about work opportunities and collaborations

A5.text: conferences provide an important channel for exchange of information between researchers
